Name: Sentience
About the game: Sentience is an online multiplayer game where 2 teams of up to 4 players wrestle for control of society long after the humans they were built to replace have disappeared. Blend in as a Rogue Use your intelligence and blend in with the AI as a Rogue to avoid detection. The Sentinels are Watching Assert control as the Sentinels tasked with catching Rogues and preventing anything, or anyone, from deviating. Do What it Takes Use your abilities and perks for detecting a sentient Rogue or escaping a Sentinel's clutches. Customize your Bot Spend your hard-earned bolts and processors to customize your robots with unique cosmetics. Change your hat, head, torso and legs to create your ideal robot. Use the ‘Chicken Dance’ taunt as a Rogue to tease a nearby Sentinel or use a ‘Jazz Hands’ finisher to show off your Sentinel skills. Explore Play across 6 stunning, dystopic levels that have lasted long after the last humans disappeared. Game features: Play as either Sentinel (hunters) or Rogue (hunted) - each with unique abilities and playstyles. Multiplayer round-based cooperative gameplay - Play individually or as a team with up to 4 friends online. Free-to-play - With upgradeable cosmetic features including animations, costumes and consumables. Leaderboards - Compete to become the best a-round. Progression and daily rewards - Be rewarded for playing daily and unlock new items as you progress. Replayable Missions - Hack terminals or deliver armed crates as a Rogue to escape the patrolling Sentinels. Fun Game Modes - For an extra challenge complete your side goal to earn extra XP. Remember to stay charged in Energy Drain mode. Sentience offers a unique take on the beloved stealth multiplayer genre with its sci-fi dystopian setting. It’s free-to-play so give it a try today! Join our discord to find folks to play with and keep up to date on all things Sentience!
